* Berend de Boer <berend@...> [2007-11-25 19:20]:
> 2. Caching works.

I don’t see how the caching situation is any different between
the scenarios where the response varies on the auth request
headers or on the cookie request headers. In both cases you’re
exchanging personalised messages.
